text: Juan Carlos I of Spain (born 1938) is a former king of Spain. Juan Carlos may also refer to: * Juan Carlos (footballer, born 1945) (1945–2012), Spanish footballer * Juan Domecq or Juan Carlos (born 1950), Cuban basketball player * Juan Carlos (footballer, born 1956), Spanish footballer * Juan Carlos (footballer, born 1965), Spanish footballer and manager * Juan Carlos (weightlifter) (born 1965), Spanish Olympic weightlifter * Juan Belencoso or Juan Carlos (born 1981), Spanish footballer * Jake Cuenca or Juan Carlos (born 1987), American-Filipino actor and footballer * Juan Carlos (footballer, born 1990), Spanish footballer * Spanish ship Juan Carlos I
